# addresses

**Instance Property**

The IPv6 addresses to assign to the TUN interface.

## Declaration

```swift
var addresses: [String] { get }
```

## Accessing IPv6 properties

- **networkPrefixLengths**: The IPv6 network prefix lengths to assign to the TUN interface.
